definitions.definition: An agent acting as a mediator between sides to facilitate agreement or cooperation.
A person or organisation in an intermediate position (in a transaction, agreement, supply chain, etc.)
examples: The intermediary between the manufacturer and retailer is the wholesaler

definitions.definition: One or several stages of an event which occurs after the start and before the end.

main_definition: An agent acting as a mediator between sides to facilitate agreement or cooperation.
secondary_definitions: A person or organisation in an intermediate position (in a transaction, agreement, supply chain, etc.)
One or several stages of an event which occurs after the start and before the end.
